00029 bool beginsWith( const string &str1, const string &str2 );
00030 // Returns string between first and second quotes or first and second apostrophes
00031 // whichever is found first. Returns the original string if there are no quotes
00032 // or apos. Returns a blank string if there is no matching second quote or apo.
00033 std::string removeQuotes( const std::string &str );
00034 std::string replaceXmlCodes( const std::string &str );
00035 
00036 struct ToLower
00037 {
00038    char operator()( char c ) const
00039    {
00040       return std::tolower(c);
00041    }
00042 };

00055       double getDoubleVal( const string &closeTag, bool &success, const string &errMsg );
00056       long int getLongVal( const string &closeTag, bool &success, const string &errMsg );
